#sidebar TableOfContents

In addition to [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp Java], you will need the following libraries in your classpath to use jSCEP:

*[http://www.bouncycastle.org/latest_releases.html Bouncy Castle Provider]*

This is used for ASN.1

*[http://commons.apache.org/codec/ Commons Codec]*

This is used for Hex and Base64 encoding and decoding.
